nodes.text: Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 4: Cadets Gone Wild

Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 4: Cadets Gone Wild is the fourth in the Planet Hoppers Carida: Heavy Duty article series, written by Cory J. Herndon and released on Wizards.com on September 25, 2003. The story involves Imperial Cadets Myrette Davani and Shira Brie during their Imperial Army training on Carida.
